jQuery Validation

Add the .pando-ajax-form to your form and the data-validation attribute for validation rules.

If you want to send files use .pando-ajax-file-form instead.

To hide/show elements after submit you can use the following classes .form-hide-success, .form-show-success, .form-show-error.

For this to work the post should return at least a JSON including {"success": true}.

For localization you have to include the components/jquery-validation/dist/localization/messages_{lang}.js file in your gulp-js-paths-vendor.js and add the data-lang="{lang}" attribute to the form.
